summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Ordinance 111623 which amended Plat 39E, Page 109 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone certain property on the east side of Western Avenue between Union and Seneca Streets from Manufacturing (M) Zone to metropolitan Commercial (CM) Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Glenn J. Amster for Harbor Steps, Inc., C.F. 291852)
